tests.question: Which scholars won Physics in 1921?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'physics' AND p.awardYear = 1921 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars were born in Germany?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'germany' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars won Chemistry prizes in 2000?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'Chemistry' AND p.awardYear = 2000 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which prizes were awarded in 1922?
tests.cypher: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1922 RETURN p.category

tests.question: Which scholars were born in Paris?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City) WHERE toLower(c.name) CONTAINS 'paris' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which institutions are located in USA?
tests.cypher: MATCH (i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'united states' OR toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'usa' RETURN i.name

tests.question: Which scholars won Nobel Prizes in Physics after 1990?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'Physics' AND p.awardYear > 1990 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with an institution in Germany died between the years 1935 and 1945?
tests.cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)
WHERE (toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'germany' OR co.name = 'DE')
  AND s.deathDate >= '1935-01-01'
  AND s.deathDate <= '1945-12-31'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS Scholarname, i.name AS InstitutionName

tests.question: Who are the female laureates in Physics?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'Physics' AND s.gender = 'female' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars born in France won a Nobel Prize in Chemistry?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' MATCH (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'france' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName

tests.question: Which Physics laureates were affiliated with an institution in Denmark?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'Physics' MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'denmark' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with Stanford University won a prize in 1996?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1996 MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'stanford' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars won the Nobel Prize in Economics in 2019?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'economics' AND p.awardYear = 2019 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with Harvard University won the Medicine prize?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS 'medicine' MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'harvard' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName

tests.question: Who won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 2020?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'physics' AND p.awardYear = 2020 RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars born in New York City won a Physics prize?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City) WHERE toLower(c.name) IN ['new york, ny', 'new york'] MATCH (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'physics' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which female scholars won the Nobel Prize in Medicine?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'medicine' AND s.gender = 'female' RETURN s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with an institution in France won the Economics prize?
tests.cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.category = 'economics' MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'france' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName

tests.question: Which scholars affiliated with an institution in Germany died between the years 1935 and 1945?
tests.cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)
WHERE (toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'germany' OR co.name = 'DE')
  AND s.deathDate >= '1935-01-01'
  AND s.deathDate <= '1945-12-31'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS Scholarname, i.name AS InstitutionName
